reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: INDUS is a bilateral forum conceived by the Dutch Embassy in Delhi. Its aim is to contribute to sustainable trade and investment between India and the Netherlands by facilitating matchmaking and promoting sustainable <(>&<)> inclusive trade. The mission of INDUS is Making Indo-Dutch trade and in-vestments sustainable and inclusive. As we believe that ‘no organization can respond to sustainable challenges like business’ (vision), INDUS strives to becoming the go-to place for sustainable and inclusive business between India and The Netherlands (objective) The approach of INDUS is online and offline matchmaking between challenges and solutions, building an online and offline community by connecting and innovating for people, planet and profit. Connecting is done by supporting companies to describe their sustainability challenge, to develop requests for connections for susta inable and inclusive business opportunities. In response to these requests or challenges, solutions will come up among the community members, and/or solutions can be searched for by a community manager. INDUS is aiming to connect Indian and Dutch businesses this way in so-called matches. During the pilot phase of INDUS – from May 2016 to April 2017, the Centre of Responsible Business and the Embassy launched the INDUS Forum after several meetings in The Netherlands and India to gauge interest from stakeholders. The implementing partner for the first year pilot (CRB) focused the Forum mainly on dialogue and knowledge sharing with proposed passive information and advice sharing on an online platform. The Embassy’s ambition level was higher and involved prioritizing private sector involvement to move beyond dialogue to enable businesses to drive real progress on the ground. After an Embassy push, a clearer vision and direction was formulated, key focus themes were identified with key stakeholders, and a steering committee was formed. During the last stages of the pilot, the Embassy involved MVO Nederland. In June 2017, with PSD Apps Sup-port, MVO Nederland visited Delhi, please see Annex 1 for the report of that mission.Together with MVO Nederland, the vision, mission and purpose of the INDUS Forum was further strengthened, culminating in below follow-up plans for 2017-2018.
